story.text: FRANKFURT German premium carmaker BMW's vehicle sales in the United States rose 16 percent year-on-year to an all-time monthly high of 33,417 units in December, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.That brought 2006 U.S. sales for the BMW Group, which includes the BMW and Mini brands, to 313,603 vehicles, up 2 percent over 2005's.BMW brand sales rose 17 percent in December to 30,945 cars. Over the full year, they rose 3 percent to 274,432 vehicles.
story.title: bmw says u . s . car sales up 16 pct to 33 , 417 cars
